title: Machine Learning-Based Optimization Process for Residential Complex Layout Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of architecture/urban design, data visualization comprehension, and simple programming concepts
context.additional_context: Practitioners experience residential complex design processes using machine learning models in VR environments and acquire optimization techniques

learning_goals: Explain the residential complex layout design optimization process using the Pix2pix model in three or more stages
Map characteristic data for each design element with 80% accuracy within a machine learning-based experimental framework (extraction-transformation-evaluation)
Optimize plaza paving and green space design in a simulation environment with over 90% success rate
Compare and analyze public facility placement and spatial structure improvement plans with real-world cases through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
